pages.text: And (We destroyed) Qarun and Pharaoh and Haman. And Moses has certainly brought them the clear proofs, but they were arrogant on the earth, and they were not overtaking (Our punishment)

We took each one (into punishment) for his sin, We sent some of them a sandstorm, and We took some of them with the awesome roar, and We sank some of them down into the earth, and We drowned some of them. God was not wrong to them, but they were doing wrong to themselves
The example of those who took a protector other than God is like the spider that makes a house for herself, and indeed the weakest house is the spiderâ€™s house, if they knew
Indeed God knows anything they call on besides Him, and He is the powerful and the wise
And these are examples, We give them for the people and only the knowledgeable understand them
God created the skies and the earth rightfully. Indeed there is a sign in that for the believers

Read what is revealed to you from the book and perform the mandatory prayer, for the mandatory prayer prevents from the indecency and the wrong (and unacceptable), and God's remembrance is certainly greater, and God knows what you do
